Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2010 08:36AM Miro wrote: Just devastating news! And her @#$%^&*+ husband was said to be by her bedside even though their divorce was within days of being final. I suppose he will marry the other woman and raise his kids with her. My heart and prayers go out to Elizabeth and her children and everyone on this forum. Each loss or potential loss is a blow to all of us. No one understands the fight unless they have been in our shoes. God Bless!
